content: this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product crochet chart is available in the pdf version of the pattern skill level intermediate sizes 4 5 by 4 5 hook size us size i/9 5 5 mm yarn samples used category 4 worsted weight yarn stitches chain half_double_crochet puff stitches double_crochet single_crochet pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that there is an online version available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern view on etsy 2 1 https //www stitching-together com/flower-crochet-granny-square-pattern-free/ 2 https //www awin1 com/cread php awinmid=6220&awinaffid=466231&clickref=flowersquare&clickref2=ravelry&ued=https%3a%2f%2fwww etsy com%2flisting%2f1688080478%2fflower-granny-square-crochet-pattern
